ParameterName.description: Key part of key-value pair with value being parameter value

ParameterValue.description: Value part of key-value pair with key being parameter Name

ConformancePackInputParameter.description: Input parameters in the form of key-value pairs for the conformance pack.

resource.description: A conformance pack is a collection of AWS Config rules and remediation actions that can be easily deployed as a single entity in an account and a region or across an entire AWS Organization.

properties.name: ConformancePackName
properties.description: Name of the conformance pack which will be assigned as the unique identifier.

type.description: Name of the conformance pack which will be assigned as the unique identifier.

properties.name: DeliveryS3Bucket
properties.description: AWS Config stores intermediate files while processing conformance pack template.

type.description: AWS Config stores intermediate files while processing conformance pack template.

properties.name: DeliveryS3KeyPrefix
properties.description: The prefix for delivery S3 bucket.

type.description: The prefix for delivery S3 bucket.

properties.name: TemplateBody
properties.description: A string containing full conformance pack template body. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

type.description: A string containing full conformance pack template body. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

properties.name: TemplateS3Uri
properties.description: Location of file containing the template body which points to the conformance pack template that is located in an Amazon S3 bucket. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

type.description: Location of file containing the template body which points to the conformance pack template that is located in an Amazon S3 bucket. You can only specify one of the template body or template S3Uri fields.

properties.name: TemplateSSMDocumentDetails
properties.description: The TemplateSSMDocumentDetails object contains the name of the SSM document and the version of the SSM document.

type.description: The TemplateSSMDocumentDetails object contains the name of the SSM document and the version of the SSM document.
